title: Sai Baba: his life is his message
creator_credit: Richard Boch and Spiritual Advancement of the Individual Foundation
brief_description: Traces the life of Sai Baba, the leader. The film visually records Sai Baba’s many miracles as they happen, through the eyes of a scientist. The film also carries the universal message of Sathya Sai Baba.
